summary: A young man is lured into a dangerous love triangle that begins to take a series of shocking and grisly supernatural turns.
cast: Milo Cawthorne|Olivia Tennet|David Whaley|Bloss Flores|Fleur Saville|Mike Ginn|Thomas Hart|Amanda Reed|Ari Boyland|Adelaide Kane|Cohen Holloway|Mike Tristano|Fred Schaefer
title: Blood Punch
